DOC.brief_summary: To obtain information on clinical practices for patients treated by Aptivus in real life
DOC.brief_title: Pharmaco-epidemiological Description of the Population Treated With Aptivus Under Market Conditions, Safety & Efficacy
DOC.criteria: HIV positive patients for whom Aptivus treatment is initiated by their physician Aptivus SCP respect None if the inclusion criteria are respected: observational study
